channel.title: dotnetcore on Jon Cain
channel.description: Recent content in dotnetcore on Jon Cain

item.title: No executable found matching command "dotnet-lambda"
item.description: When packaging up a dotnetcore lambda function for deployment to AWS, you would run the following command: dotnet lambda package -o ../../build/{DestinationFileName}.zip However, when I ran this command earlier today on a new Lambda function project, I got the following error: No executable found matching command "dotnet-lambda" This is because the Amazon.Lambda.Tools package isn’t being included in the dotnet build process, so to fix things, I had to edit the .
